column1: HOMER:  "TO _______ !  THE|CAUSE OF, AND SOLUTION TO, ALL|OF LIFE'S PROBLEMS!"
LISA:  "THEY MADE THE WORLD'S|LARGEST PIZZA, SO WE|____________________"
BART:  "OH LOOK, YOU'RE|GETTING CRANKY.  YOU HAVEN'T|HAD ________."
\\HANK SCORPIO:  "BUT HOMER, ON|YOUR WAY OUT, IF YOU WANT TO|_____ SOMEBODY, IT WOULD HELP|ME A LOT."
\\HOMER:  "SO I SAID, 'LOOK|BUDDY, YOUR CAR WAS|____________ WHEN WE GOT|HERE......."
HOMER:  ".....AND AS FOR YOUR|___________, SHE SHOULDN'T|HAVE MOUTHED OFF LIKE THAT!"
\\TROY MCCLURE:  "YOU MAY|REMEMBER ME FROM SUCH SELF|HELP VIDEOS AS|________________ AND 'GET|CONFIDENT, STUPID!'"
\\HOMER:  LISTEN, YOU DRAIN|CLOGGING, ______________,|COLLECT CALL GETTING SPONGE..I|WANT YOU OUT OF MY HOUSE!
\\MOE:  "I'M LOOKING FOR AMANDA|HUGGINKISS!  WHY CAN'T I FIND|AMANDA HUGGINKISS?" BARNEY:|"____________________ !"
\\APU:  "YOU MAY EMERGE FROM MY|CHIPS, SIR.  THE OPPORTUNITY|TO PROVE YOURSELF ___________|IS LONG GONE."
